dct_title_s: World gas map : 2018 edition / produced by Petroleum Economist, a division of Gulf Publishing, in partnership with Chevron ; designed by K. Fuller and P. Bush. (Title Card)
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by shading and gradient tints. Depth shown by shading and bathymetric tints. "Published December 2017." Shows gas fields, gas pipelines, liquefied natural gas import terminals, liquefied natural gas export plants, gas processing plants, underground gas storages, and offshore terminals. Title panel and advertisement on verso. Includes: 8 insets, descriptive legend, statistical tables, and graphs for World gas consumption-2016, LNG trade Movements-2016 and World gas production-2016. Accompanies: Petroleum Economist, v.84, no. 10, December 2017/January 2018. "Satellite derived imagery courtesy of: CGG NPA Satellite Mapping."
